Christopher,
I would do this way by means of 'echo -n' :

---------------------------
#!/bin/csh -f
set a = `rcalc .....`
echo -n $a > output
----------------------------

Not sure it's what you are looking for..
BTW I hope it helps somehow...
cheers,
giulio
